Class millionPurlLoadTest

java.lang.Object
  org.purl.test.millionPurlLoadTest

public final class millionPurlLoadTest
extends java.lang.Object

Attempts to load 1 million PURLs into a PURL server.

createPurls

public java.lang.String createPurls(java.lang.String filename)
Create a batch of PURLs via an HTTP POST.

Parameters:
filename - The name of a file in the "testdata" directory that holds input data.

registerUser

public java.lang.String registerUser(java.lang.String uid,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String affiliation,
                                     java.lang.String email,
                                     java.lang.String passwd,
                                     java.lang.String hint,
                                     java.lang.String justification)
Register a new user via an HTTP POST. NB: Assumes that immediate user registration is available in the PURL server. To turn on immediate user registration, unset in src/mod-purl-admin/modules/mod-purl-admin/etc/PURLConfig.xml

Parameters:
uid - A user id (e.g. "dwood").
name - The name of the user (e.g. "David Wood").
affiliation - The user's affiliation (such as a company name).
email - The user's email address
passwd - The user's new password (to create the account; a password is not required to authenticate yet).
hint - A hint that they user can later user to remember their password.
justification - A justification as to why the account should be created (some PURL servers require this).
